name: my-react-app
description: #metamask: two sign data: eth_signTypedData_v4 - Use this method to request the most human-readable signatures that are efficient to process on-chain. We recommend this for most use cases. personal_sign - Use this method for the easiest way to request human-readable signatures that don't need to be efficiently processed on-chain. https://docs.metamask.io/wallet/how-to/sign-data/ https://docs.metamask.io/wallet/reference/eth_signTypedData_v4/
